Flame Patrol Vice Captain Tuska:
Training the mind is a far more difficult task than training the body. But this must be done. When you are in a dangerous place, you have to be even more diligent with your mind training.
I, Tuska, am now here to keep peace, according to the will of Kakai the Lord of Flame. You, however, are a wide-ranging traveler. I grow suspicious of why you are here.
